column5: Corner lot house about 20 minutes from DFW Airport. There are plenty of food options/cuisines nearby; an outdoor shopping mall focused on restaurants is within 2 miles. AT&T Stadium and Globe Life Park within 5-6 miles! Nice parks nearby. Washer/dryer/back porch access. My place is good for solo adventurers or 2 guests!
column8: Cozy private bedroom in a house!
